# Hello Name
> Print names with hello


## Install

`pip install hello_name`

## How to use

`Enter the name when calling the function hello_name`

`Enter the name when calling the class HelloSayer and then print it via say()`


## Examples

```python
hello_name('world')
```




    'hello world'



```python
a = HelloSayer('a')
a.say()
```




    'hello a'
